official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Cape Romain National Wildlife Refuge in South Carolina, as a wilderness area under the Wilderness Act.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Cape Romain National Wildlife Refuge, South Carolina, as a wilderness area under the Wilderness Act.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Cape Romain National Wildlife Refuge in South Carolina, as a wilderness area under the Wilderness Act.
